description: Impanuka nyinshi zikomeye zishobora gukumirwa mu gihe ababyeyi cyangwa abandi bita ku bana bakurikiranira ha uburere bwabo no kumenya ko aho batuye cyangwa bakinira ari heza kandi hizewe.
title: Impanuka nyinshi zikomeye zishobora gukumirwa mu gihe ababyeyi cyangwa abandi bita ku bana bakurikiranira ha uburere bwabo no kumenya ko aho batuye cyangwa bakinira ari heza kandi hizewe.
content:
Impanuka nyinshi zikomeye zishobora gukumirwa mu gihe ababyeyi cyangwa abandi bita ku bana bakurikiranira ha uburere bwabo no kumenya ko aho batuye cyangwa bakinira ari heza kandi hizewe.

Abana bato, akenshi iyo bamaze gutangira kugenda ha y’iwabo, cyane cyane abari mu kigero cyo hagati y’amezi 12 n’imyaka 4, baba bashobora guhura n’impanuka mu rugo cyangwa ha yaho. Abo bana basabwa kwitabwaho by’umwihariko ku buryo nta kibazo bagomba guhura nacyo nko kubarinda umuriro wo mu gikoni, amasoko y’amazi, ahantu habi bashobora guhanuka, imihanda ndetse n’ibintu bishobora kubahumanya, ku hagonga cyangwa se kubakomeretsa.
